channel.title: Server Tool V2 (1200 downloads) Restarter, CrashDetector, Compiler - All In ONE!
channel.description:
[anchor=i] [size=19pt]Index:[/size] [size=15pt] - [iurl=#u]Uses[/iurl] - [iurl=#p]Pics[/iurl] - [iurl=#sp]Scan Pic[/iurl] - [iurl=#dl]Download Link[/iurl] - [iurl=#ig]Installation Guide[/size]
[anchor=u][size=19pt]Uses:[/size] [size=10pt][iurl=#i][Index][/iurl][/size] [b]1. [/b]Run your server and restart it every w/e mins. (And there is a button called "Restart NOW" that will restart it for you right away and continue with restarting every w/e mins). Also, I added a CrashDetector that will detect if your server ever crashes and it will restart it for you again. Since Dec. 01, 2008, I've made it so that it minimizes to your System Tray and you still have full control over it by right clicking, and by clicking on the Tray Icon it will open back up.
[b]2.[/b] Compile your server for you. This compiler will work for [b]ANY[/b] version of JDK, as long as you have it installed.
[b]3.[/b] There is a console that replaces the Command Prompt (that old-fashioned black screen you see). After pressing a button go to it and just view what is going on from there.
This is supposed to replace any batch files and black screens that pop up while compiling and running your server. Also, it is just one file and one screen, no need to worry about anything else.
[b]WARNING: If there is ever an ERROR ID that appears after compiling or running your server, please tell me.[/b]
[anchor=p][size=19pt]Pics:[/size] [size=10pt][iurl=#i][Index][/iurl][/size] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/akbvw3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/20tgk7t.gif[/img]
[anchor=sp][size=19pt]Scan Pic:[/size] [size=10pt][iurl=#i][Index][/iurl][/size] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2jg8geb.jpg[/img]
[anchor=dl][size=19pt]Download Link:[/size] [size=10pt][iurl=#i][Index][/iurl][/size] - [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=289278.0;attach=14183]Attached file[/url]
[anchor=ig][size=17pt]Installation Guide:[/size] [size=10pt][iurl=#i][Index][/iurl][/size] 1. Download file 2. Put in your server folder 3. Double click on the JAR
Please feel free to suggest any new features that you want included! Small features are to be suggested too, if they help even a little, please suggest them.
[url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=pm;sa=send;u=119874]PM ME[/url] or [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;topic=289278.0;]POST HERE[/url]
[b]ADDED AUTO UPDATER! ENJOY AUTOMATIC UPDATES, NO MORE COMING HERE TO CHECK FOR NEW VERSIONS.[/b]
